body: How is this slut not pregnant yet?
I like this series keep up the good work
At this point, after all those years, everyone should know who is our beloved Ai-chan. Always happy. Always feeling good. Immune to any STD.
@tobajas you're thinking of Houkago Love Mode, same author but different girl but also the same premise
Is there a page missing or something? She picks up the papers and suddenly looks like she was posted into the pool.
This is not ntr it's just a reverse harem in doujin

With this author if a girl trips she's going to land on a dick 10 times outta 10 whether it's the bf or not usually it's not. I'm honestly surprised that this author didn't write a story about a girl waking up and yawning out a window when a dick suddenly flies in her mouth

Lel this author still doing this shit, at least in this one the boyfriend actually got to sleep with her and is seemingly doing it between the other guys. The first work dang bf and gf is about to have sex and then his brother comes home and interupts them then there are 16 chapters in total were they are interrupted over and over from having sex with her sleeping with anyone who has a pulse and a dick. From what I remember she sleeps with the bf's brother, best friend, class mate, teacher, the coach and anyone seemingly even remotely close to the bf and a some other guys like instead of sleeping with the bf she'll sleep with some guy working at the hot spring their visiting. Then the gf actually complains to god how ppl shouldn't stop coming in between them. Even though at least 90% of the times it's cause she goes of to cheat on the bf. But yeah in ch 17 they sleep together and seem to get a happy ending in the last page though I still feel like she would just keep on cheating on him

@Lawli she has a boyfriend, she cheats on him whenever she someone so much as brushes up against her. She even fucked an old guy in the shower just because he walked in on her. Hell, she's even cheating on him actively with her manager at her job.
Ozaki should've ended this ages ago. Even the other cheating manga she was doing was getting tedious even at 17 chapters.
she's still making these after all these years? holy shit

I have this artist blacklisted for a reason.
this might seem wholesome till you read the other chapter
This chapter itself is already cheating tbh, the girl already has a boyfriend she's in a relationship since chapter one.
Cheating tag comes from the following chapters, she's a slut and sleeps with anyone that touches her.
I don't get the cheating tag
